Package game.actions.trading

Class TradeManager

java.lang.Object
game.actions.trading.TradeManager
public class TradeManager
extends java.lang.Object
A manager that handles all trading and swapping Created by:
Author:
Salar Ghadrigolestani Modified by: Salar Ghadrigolestani

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static TradeManager instance
    The singular instance of TradeManager to call statically

    list of registered items
    private java.util.Map<Merchant,​java.util.ArrayList<Item>> merchantItemList
    a map of merchants to the items that they sell

    a map of maps, that maps merchants to their own price lists(list of items and their buy,sell prices)
    private java.util.Map<Merchant,​java.util.ArrayList<WeaponItem>> merchantWeaponList

    the player involved in the swap
    private java.util.Map<Item,​java.util.ArrayList<WeaponItem>> swapList
    a map of items to the weapons that they can be swapped with

    list of registered swappables(items that can be swapped)
    private java.util.ArrayList<Merchant> swappers
    list of registered swappers(merchants that can perform a swap action)
    private java.util.ArrayList<WeaponItem> weapons
    list of registered weapons

    • checkForSwaps

      public ActionList checkForSwaps​(Merchant merchant)
      returns an Action list of swap actions for each registered swappable that the player is holding
      Parameters:
      merchant - the merchant that the player is interacting with
      Returns:
      an Action list of swapActions

    • checkForSales

      public ActionList checkForSales​(Merchant merchant)
      returns an Action list of sell actions for each registered item/weapon that the player is holding
      Parameters:
      merchant - the merchant that the player is interacting with
      Returns:
      an Action list of SellActions

    • checkForPurchases

      public ActionList checkForPurchases​(Merchant merchant)
      returns an Action list of Buy actions for each item/weapon that the merchant can sell
      Parameters:
      merchant - the merchant that the player is interacting with
      Returns:
      an Action list of BuyActions

    • checkForTrades

      public ActionList checkForTrades​(Merchant merchant)
      checks which actions the player can perform with the merchant
      Parameters:
      merchant - the merchant that the player is interacting with
      Returns:
      an Action list of all valid actions that the player can perform with the merchant

    • getWeapons

      public java.util.ArrayList<WeaponItem> getWeapons()
      Returns:
      list of registered weapons

    • registerPlayer

      public void registerPlayer​(Player player)
      registers the player with TradeManager
      Parameters:
      player - the player to be registered

    • registerSwappable

      public void registerSwappable​(Item swappable, java.util.ArrayList<WeaponItem> swapList)
      registers the swappable with TradeManager and maps the swapList to the swappable
      Parameters:
      swappable - the swappable to be registered with TradeManager
      swapList - the swapList to be mapped to the swappable

    • registerMerchant

      public void registerMerchant​(Merchant merchant, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> priceList, java.util.ArrayList<WeaponItem> weaponList, java.util.ArrayList<Item> itemList)
      maps the priceList, the weaponList and the itemList to the merchant
      Parameters:
      merchant - the merchant that the lists are being mapped to
      priceList - the priceList to be mapped to the merchant
      weaponList - the weaponList to be mapped to the merchant
      itemList - the itemList to be mapped to the merchant
